Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Henan Zhongan Jianpei Education Technology Co., Ltd. ("Henan Zhongan" for short) is an Internet education service organization focusing on vocational qualification certificate examination training and corporate talent training in the field of vocational education. The company settled in Zhengzhou through investment promotion and has now become the focus of investment promotion in the Seventh District of Zhengzhou No. 2 Middle School Enterprise and a key contract signing project for the "Three Batches" activities in Henan Province. It has a project license.
The company actively responds to the country's call for "Opinions on Promoting the High-Quality Development of Modern Education" and uses high-quality teachers, in-depth and pragmatic teaching styles and flexible and diverse vocational teaching methods to delve into the field of vocational education, pursue a professional development path, and integrate On the basis of high-quality resources such as professional colleges, industry mentors, and construction companies, we are based on the Internet education platform and continuously optimize the quality of products and services.
At present, Henan Zhongan relies on its advantages in teachers, products, and services to provide high-quality products and services for hundreds of millions of dollars across the country. It has developed into a comprehensive vocational education brand that provides policy research, application consultation, education and training and other services, creating a Realize career dreams and help corporate personnel improve their professional qualities.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
PoroTomoï¼š
Released to the public as part of the Department of Energy's Open Energy Data Initiative, these data represent vertical and horizontal distributed acoustic sensing (DAS) data collected as part of the Poroelastic Tomography (PoroTomo) project funded in part by the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy (EERE), U.S. Department of Energy.

Tutorials:
    *PoroTomo DAS Data Processing Tutorial for hdf5 Files by Nicole Taverna and Michael Rossol.
    *PoroTomo DAS Data Processing Tutorial for hdf5 Files via HSDS and h5pyd by Michael Rossol and Nicole Taverna.
    *PoroTomo DAS Data Processing Tutorial for SEG-Y Files by Nicole Taverna and Ross Ring-Jarvi.
